item.title: About Us
item.description: The Complex Play Lab is a research lab homed in the Design, Informal, and Creative Education program in the Dept. of Curriculum and Instruction at UWâ€“Madison. It is affiliated with the Computer Sciences Dept., the UW Game Lab, the Holtz Center for Science & Technology Studies, the Learning Sciences program in the Educational Psychology Dept., the iSchool, and the STEP Lab at MIT. A major goal of the CPL is to support minoritized and under-served students in learning to create with technology so that their voices and values can be amplified.
